text:
Hey guys, how are you? I'm having a bug to see if you can help me.
Use the hubDB table field to select multiple at once. The theme that to go through it, in the preview works perfectly for me but it does not let me publish because supposedly there is an error which does not exist (image 3 and 4). I found another option but it turns out that it returns empty arrays (Image 1 and 2).
Any solution??
